author: Your Name
install_msg: Thanks for installing the Toxic cog! Use `[p]help toxic` to see available commands.
name: Toxic
short: Vote-based kick/ban system for server members with matching roles.
description: Allows server members to initiate votes to kick or ban other members with the same roles. Configurable vote duration, threshold, and more.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores data about active votes including the initiator, target, and reason. No personal data is stored after votes are completed.
